bankoffice.name: Update Saving Plans Bank Office
bankoffice.sql:
UPDATE SPS_PERIODIC SET SPS_PERIODIC_CUSTOMFIELD2 = $2Input, GO_USER_LASTUPDATED_BY_ID = $donebyUserId WHERE SPS_PERIODIC_ID = $primaryId
DECLARE @DepartmentID INT SELECT @DepartmentID = GO_DEPARTMENT_ID FROM GO_DEPARTMENT WHERE GO_DEPARTMENT_ACTIVE = 1 AND GO_DEPARTMENT_EXTERNALID = $input
IF @DepartmentID IS NOT NULL BEGIN DECLARE @UserID INT SELECT @UserID = GO_USER_ID FROM GO_USER WHERE GO_DEPARTMENT_ID = @DepartmentID AND GO_USER_ACTIVE = 1
IF @UserID IS NULL RAISERROR (N'The User is not existing.', 18,1, NULL,0) ELSE BEGIN DECLARE @DistributorID INT SELECT @DistributorID = DPT.TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID FROM GO_DEPARTMENT DPT INNER JOIN TRX_DISTRIBUTOR DIS ON DPT.TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID = DIS.TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID WHERE GO_DEPARTMENT_ID = @DepartmentID AND TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ACTIVE = 1
IF @DistributorID IS NULL RAISERROR (N'The Distributor is not existing.', 18,1, NULL,0) ELSE BEGIN UPDATE TXI_USERSHARING SET GO_DEPARTMENT_ID = @DepartmentID, GO_USER_ID = @UserID, TRX_DISTRIBUTOR_ID = @DistributorID WHERE TXI_USERSHARING_TABLE = 'SPS_PERIODIC' AND TXI_USERSHARING_FOREIGNKEY = $primaryId END END END ELSE BEGIN RAISERROR (N'The Department is not existing.', 18,1, NULL,0) END
